3m(tm) scotchkote(tm) hot melt patch compound 226p, green
misuse of 3m industrial and occupational products may result in injury, sickness, death, or property damage
3m scotchkote hot melt patch compounds are heat bondable polymeric coatings in stick form designed for plant and field repair of scotchkote fusion bonded epoxy coatings
scotchkote hot melt patch compounds are ideal for repairing minor pinholes and abrasions
3m industrial and occupational products are intended, labeled, and packaged for sale to trained industrial and occupational customers for workplace use
